description:
The fjørå wool T-shirt is a light mountain bike shirt made in a wool/synthetic mix perfect for all-year biking. Offering a functional combination of wool, recycled polyester, and polyester, it will become a favorite for all single track bikers in warmer conditions. The narrow fitted and lightweight tee is durable and offers excellent moisture management due to its construction. It has a superb next-to-skin comfort, and the fabric has a high UPF and excellent pilling and snagging performance.

You can effortlessly push limits and increase the intensity, thanks to sustainable metal-free odor treatment. Practical features include a longer cut in the back for extra protection and flatlock seams and a clean hem.
name: Norrona Fjora Wool T-Shirt - Mens
